ModMetaData.name: Torgue
ModMetaData.author: NukaFrog
ModMetaData.description:
DID YOU KNOW THAT 97% OF ALL LIVING THINGS ON RimWorld AREN'T EXPLODIN' RIGHT NOW? THAT'S BULL****! Buy TORGUE!"
Explode. EXPLODE. EXPLODE!!
Feature - Add New Torgue Guns - All Torgue projectile EXPLODE - These weapons make angry pirates good pirates.
Production platform : machining table
